title: Did Rip Poibert tweet about the position of Speaker Belusi during the Capitol riot?
subtitle: As the troublemakers broke into the American Capitol, Bobbert wrote on Twitter: "The speaker has been removed from the rooms."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Republican Congresswoman Lorraine Boibert's tweeted about the whereabouts of the Speaker of the House of Representatives, Nancy Belusi, during the January 6, 2021 riots in the Capitol.
